Text.Page:
Fusion science...some say we're on the fringe, but that's just jealousy! Jealousy, I say!

Fusion science is the key to ultimate power! Turn away from your petty clockworks and dusty grimoires. Embrace the future!

But study first. There'll be a test.

Fusion science combines magic and machinery. (Details omitted.)

The most successful example of fusion science is the Core, which combines energy from the Flower of Life with a mechanically augmented lifeform. (Details omitted.)
The most crucial elements of fusion science are the material components used to channel the magic, and their creation is a matter of great delicacy. (Details omitted.)

You look confident.

Ready to embrace the future? Let's see how hard you've studied.
In fusion science, material components channel this force. What is it?
I'm disappointed. You were fated to do more than this!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I know, and I'll do better."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Perhaps so. Until then, go back to the Collegium Arcane and study harder.
Is your head attached to your body?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I wish it were right."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
You know what I wish? That you'd go back to the Collegium Arcane and study harder.
Wrong, wrong, wrong.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I fell asleep while studying..."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Go back to Collegium Arcane and study harder. And stay awake this time!
That's right! The future is yours!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"That was kinda easy."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Yes, but the future has no place for the dull-witted.
Fusion science combines what two elements?
You've been hanging out with the mechanical engineers, I see. Wrong!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Can I try again?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Of course, but go back to the Collegium Arcane and read the correct book this time!
Correct! You really did study!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"These questions are kinda basic..."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
I know they are. You're just proving that you didn't skip the reading.
You're either joking with me, or you're hormone-addled. Either way, wrong!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'll study more."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
At this point, I'll take what I can get. Go back to the Collegium Arcane and study harder.
Here's my reaction: Wrong!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I can do better!"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
You have a chance to take action: go back to Collegium Arcane and study harder.
What is the most successful example of fusion science?
Did you just think, "I'll answer the first thing that pops into my head?" Wrong!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I should hit the books."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Indeed you should. Go back to the Collegium Arcane and study harder.
Pegasus travel is but a trifle! A fad, I say!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"This was covered in the book?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Yes, not that you'd know. Go back to the Collegium Arcane and study harder.
A correct answer! Excellent.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"It's also the only example."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Perhaps, but that's why we study, <PCNAME>!
Magic stones? A tuwangi term for so many things that litter the landscape of our world! Wrong!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Can I get a do-over?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
You may "do-over" whatever you like, but first go back to the Collegium Arcane and study harder.

There's no end to learning.
Keep studying, and perhaps the future will be yours!
